languages.text: "Святой механизм ниспослал откровение — фиксирую сообщаемые координаты на одном из миров системы Одиночество Пелиона".
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."
languages.original_text: "Святой механизм ниспослал откровение — фиксирую сообщаемые координаты на одном из миров системы Одиночество Пелиона".

traits.locale_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in Pelium Solitas system."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in Pelium Solitas system."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas system."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas system."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."
"The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

languages.text: "Der heilige Mechanismus hat eine Offenbarung gesendet. Die übertragenen Koordinaten gehören zu einer der Welten im Pelium-Solitas-System."
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

traits.locale_text: "Der heilige Mechanismus hat eine Offenbarung gesendet. Die übertragenen Koordinaten gehören zu einer der Welten im Pelium-Solitas-System."

languages.text: « Le saint mécanisme nous a envoyé une révélation. Les coordonnées transmises correspondent à un lieu sur l'un des mondes du système de Pelium Solitas. »
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

traits.locale_text: « Le saint mécanisme nous a envoyé une révélation. Les coordonnées transmises correspondent à un lieu sur l'un des mondes du système de Pelium Solitas. »

languages.text: «El mecanismo sagrado ha enviado una revelación. Las coordenadas transmitidas se corresponden con uno de los mundos del sistema Pelium Solitas».
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

traits.locale_text: «El mecanismo sagrado ha enviado una revelación. Las coordenadas transmitidas se corresponden con uno de los mundos del sistema Pelium Solitas».

languages.text: 「聖なるメカニズムから啓示が送られました。送信先座標はペリウム・ソリタス星系のいずれかの世界です」
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なるメカニズムから啓示が送られました。送信先座標はペリウム・ソリタス星系のいずれかの世界です」

languages.text: “神圣机械发出了启示。解析结果分析，传输的坐标对应培利亚·索利塔斯星系中的某个世界。”
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."

traits.locale_text: “神圣机械发出了启示。解析结果分析，传输的坐标对应培利亚·索利塔斯星系中的某个世界。”

languages.text: "Kutsal mekanizma, bir vahiy bahşetti. İletilen koordinatların Pelium Solitas Sistemi'ndeki dünyalardan birinde bulunan bir konuma ait olduğu kararına varıldı."
languages.original_text: "The holy mechanism has sent forth a revelation. The transmitted coordinates resolve to a location on one of the worlds in the Pelium Solitas System."
